text: (And the blind man) i.e. the disbelievers (and the seer) i.e. the believer (are not equal) in reward and honour, (neither are those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (and do good works) and do acts of obedience between them and their Lord ((equal with) the evil-doer) the one who ascribes partners to Allah. (Little do you reflect) they do not take any admonition from the similitudes of the Qur'an!
